short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrollable app icons that display descriptions on hover and load Streamlit apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blobber's AI Garage is an interactive Chrome extension designed for users who want to streamline access to AI-powered tools and apps. With a sleek interface, the extension allows users to browse, explore, and interact with a curated collection of AI tools directly from the extension popup. Each tool is represented as an icon, and by hovering over the icons, users can quickly see the app’s description and purpose.

Why install Blobber’s AI Garage?

- Quick Access to AI Tools: Load and interact with a variety of AI tools, from task automation to data analysis and more, all within a single extension.
- User-Friendly Navigation: Scroll through icons, hover for descriptions, and load your desired app with just one click.
- Interactive IFrames: Open AI-powered tools directly in the extension without leaving your browsing session.
- Customizable: Rearrange your favorite tools by dragging and dropping icons to suit your workflow.
- No Setup Required: No sign-up or installation of external software is needed. Simply click, explore, and interact with AI apps.

Whether you're an AI enthusiast, researcher, or productivity seeker, Blobber’s AI Garage brings a suite of essential AI tools at your fingertips—quick, easy, and accessible through your browser toolbar!
